title: Savory Fall Stew
summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give Savory Fall Stew a try. Watching your figure? This caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal recipe has 679 calories, 21g of protein, and 35g of fat per serving. For $4.12 per serving, this recipe covers 47% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 4. It will be a hit at your Autumn event. 63 people have tried and liked this recipe. A mixture of fennel bulb, salt, carrots, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so yummy. To use up the salt you could follow this main course with the Apple Turnovers Recipe as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 1 hour and 15 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 97%. This score is awesome. Similar recipes are Savory Fall Stew, One Pot Savory Chicken and Fall Produce, and Make a savory galette for simple fall entertaining.
